DOC.brief_summary: Maximal strength train show increase muscular strength , muscular volume work economy . An 8 week maximal leg press training regime conduct cardiac heart failure patient evaluate whether increase maximal leg press strength , work economy , serum testosterone quality life . The study hypotheses : 1 . Aerobic work capacity increase due increase work economy , without increase maximal oxygen uptake . 2 . Strength train increase serum testosterone .
DOC.brief_title: Maximal Leg Press Strength Training Study Coronary Artery Disease Patients
DOC.criteria: Clinically diagnose coronary artery disease Stable coronary artery disease 1.5 mm depression ST segment cycling strain test Between 1870 year age Unstable coronary artery disease Other limitation exercise coronary artery disease Participants study intervention
